events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago, but the package still hasn't arrived. The tracking shows no updates.
The case was categorized as a delivery delay issue based on the customer's message mentioning late shipment and tracking lack of updates.
Agent John has been assigned to handle the customer's delivery delay inquiry and provide assistance.
Hello! I'm John from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your order delay. Could you please provide your order number?
To better assist you, may I have the exact order number and the shipping address used when placing the order?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and it was shipped to 456 Maple Street, Springfield. Thanks for your help.
Thank you for the details. I've contacted the courier service to get an update, and we'll expedite the shipping to ensure your package arrives within the next three days.
I appreciate your prompt response and effort to speed up the delivery. Looking forward to receiving the package soon.
We have confirmed that your package has been shipped and is out for delivery. Please expect it to arrive today or tomorrow at the latest.
Just following up to ensure your package arrived safely and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your delivery delay.
Since your delivery issue is resolved, we are closing this case now. Please contact us if you need further assistance in the future.
